metadata.title: CVE-2024-24785 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: If errors returned from MarshalJSON methods contain user controlled data,they may be used to break the contextual auto-escaping behavior of thehtml/template package, allowing for subsequent actions to inject unexpectedcontent into templates.

criterions.comment: golang: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.10 package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
